message:
路由器是 buffalo WZR-HP-G300NH2，刷了官方的DD-WRT，版本号是v24-sp2，
学校用的是锐捷3.95，固定IP，不固定MAC，

路由器上设了静态IP

mentohust用的misp版的（45kB版的那个文件 http://code.google.com/p/mentohust/issues/detail?id=175 ），用WinSCP传入路由器




root@DD-WRT:~# chmod 755 /tmp/mentohust
root@DD-WRT:~# /tmp/mentohust -u*** -p*** -nbr0 -i*.*.*.* -m*.*.*.* -g*.*.*.* -s*.*.*.* -a0 -d2 -b2 -v3.95

welcome to MentoHUST    ver: 0.3.1
Copyright (C) 2009-2010 HustMoon Studio
Bug report to http://code.google.com/p/mentohust/issues/list

>> Enter the background mode, using parameters - k can exit the authentication.
root@DD-WRT:~# ** UserName:     zzhong
** Netcard:     br0
** Netcard Addr:        59.64.69.254
** DNS Addr:    202.205.208.6
** Auth timeout(s):     8 s
** Heartbeat interval(s):       30 s
** Failure waittime(s): 15 s
** Allow failures:      8 times
** Multicast addr:      standard
** DHCP Type:   Certified
** DHCP script: dhclient
** MAC: 10:6f:3f:3d:53:62
** IP:  192.168.11.1
** Netmask:     255.255.255.0
!! Save the authentication parameters to /jffs/etc/mentohust.conf failure锛
** The authentication parameters has been successfully save to /tmp/root/mentohust.conf.

/tmp/mentohust -k

welcome to MentoHUST    ver: 0.3.1
Copyright (C) 2009-2010 HustMoon Studio
Bug report to http://code.google.com/p/mentohust/issues/list

>> Already sends exit signals to MentoHUST (PID=1830).
>> exit
>> exit




是不是网卡设置的不对呢？

title: 伟大的技术宅啊，有谁用过mentohust吗？我用路由器拨号，总提示找不到服务器
